note: Jeju Localnet - STATIC port 9545 (L2), port 8545 (L1). Port forwarding handled automatically by 'bun run dev'.

uniswapV4.note: Deploy with: JEJU_NETWORK=mainnet JEJU_RPC_URL=http://localhost:8545 PRIVATE_KEY=0xac... bun run scripts/deploy-uniswap-v4.ts

ElizaOSToken.note: Deploy with forge script: forge script script/DeployLocalnet.s.sol:DeployLocalnet --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 --broadcast --legacy

jejuMarket.note: Requires ElizaOSToken and predictionOracle to be deployed first

caliguland.note: Located in apps/caliguland/contracts/, needs separate deployment

rpgGames.note: CANONICAL contracts for ALL RPG games - deployed once, shared by all. Located in contracts/src/games/rpg/standard/tokens/

deploymentSteps: 1. Start Jeju localnet: bun run dev (starts Kurtosis with chain ID 1337)
2. Alternative: Use bootstrap script: bun run scripts/bootstrap-localnet-complete.ts
3. All contracts are auto-deployed by bootstrap script
5. No manual deployment needed - fully automated
status: TEMPLATE - Update with actual deployed addresses
